Description: On Rt. 634 in the County of Brunswick, in the vicinity of Big Horn Rd; Rt. 633N/S (Brunswick County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-85 at mile marker 67 in the City of Petersburg, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 49.7 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 158.8 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. The north left shoulder and left lane are closed.

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 194 in the County of Henrico, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east right shoulder is closed.
